name: CAAutoresizingMask
desc: These constants are used by the autoresizingMask property.

items.name: static var layerMinXMargin: CAAutoresizingMask
items.desc: The left margin between the receiver and its superview is flexible.

items.name: static var layerMaxXMargin: CAAutoresizingMask
items.desc: The right margin between the receiver and its superview is flexible.

items.name: static var layerMinYMargin: CAAutoresizingMask
items.desc: The bottom margin between the receiver and its superview is flexible.

items.name: static var layerMaxYMargin: CAAutoresizingMask
items.desc: The top margin between the receiver and its superview is flexible.
